{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$38.9M in 2021-2022** on contracts with ADVANCED CHIPPEWA TECHNOLOGIES.

Across 671 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 49 have at least one amendment (7%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 96% and the average number of amendments was 1.57. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$32.8M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.75 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$246.8K. The longest contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$31.9M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
